item.title: Why Go Hugo?
item.description: For years I have worked with WordPress along with its themes, plugins, and vulnerabilities. I even purchased a couple of themes. Yes, WP can make a pretty site but at the end of the day I spent a lot of time working on WP and not working on content. It was time to move on to a different way of publishing. There were a several reasons that I moved from a dynamic site to a static site.
